structure.unit: B KENTUCKY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE AUTHORITY

law.catch_line: Powers and duties of developing authority and issuing authority -- Project development restrictions.

text.section: Projects may be developed in conjunction with other road development efforts of the Commonwealth that are in compliance with Federal Highway Administration requirements.

Projects developed pursuant to this chapter shall:
Comply with the requirements of KRS Chapters 45A, 174, and 176;
Be included in the most recently enacted biennial highway construction plan; and
Comply with all relevant requirements of the Federal Highway Administration.

law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 79, effective June 26, 2009.
